data.name: Refoil
data.detailed_description:
All alone with no recollection of his life before, our hero fights his way through legions of alien creatures, guided by the glimmer of hope that he'll find out why he is here and where he belongs.

A never-ending, ever-changing maze is ahead of you. Permadeath lurks around every corner, chances of success: quite low. Are you up for the challenge?

Game features:

• Explore beautiful, hand-drawn alien worlds and fight hostile creatures in each run
• Every playthrough reveals a new world to discover and get lost in
• Various builds allow you to customize and master your tactics
• Evolve and improve your skills as you advance
• The game's difficulty and your enjoyment go hand in hand. You’ll rage when you die. You’ll continue on this arduously masochistic quest, just to die again. And again. And again.

data.short_description: Slashing and blasting through enemies, raging when you die, improving skills, enduring pain and pushing your limits. This and much more awaits you in this rogue-lite metroidvania.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
